entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
